thread.title: Simon Mignolet says financial lure of China is the talk of Premier League dressing rooms these days
thread.title_full: Simon Mignolet says financial lure of China is the talk of Premier League dressing rooms these days

author: Simon Mullock
title: Simon Mignolet says financial lure of China is the talk of Premier League dressing rooms these days
text:
Sport Simon Mignolet says financial lure of China is the talk of Premier League dressing rooms these days The Liverpool goalkeeper says any player who would turn down a big money move to China is a hypocrite Share Mignolet says everyone is talking about China (Photo: Clive Brunskill) Share Get Liverpool FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Simon Mignolet has revealed that the huge financial lure of the Chinese football is the talk of Premier League dressing rooms. 
And the Liverpool keeper insists that any player who claims he would turn down the chance to make millions in the Far East is an hypocrite. 
Mignolet said: “You would be a hypocrite to say we don’t speak about it because it’s a big topic. Everybody’s speaking about it. 
“You see the money and of course you talk about it. Mignolet doesn't think they want any 'keepers in China (Photo: Reuters) Read More The cautionary tale of Paul Gascoigne's ill-fated move to China 
“I’m a keeper and I don’t think they want any keepers. 
“I know the next question is would you go to China - and the only answer you can give is that you don’t know unless you get an actual proposal. 
“You can’t weigh up the pros and cons until you actually receive an offer.” poll loading Who will be Liverpool's long-term No.1? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
